channel.title: Beef Vegetable on The Ulampinoy Project

item.title: Spicy Hot Beef Broccoli
item.description: I felt the need for some heat & action this weekend. That my friends is synonymous to stir-frying. Action-packed cooking from the chopping board to the wok. Ingredients Beef tenderloin, cut into strips Broccoli Red bell peppers Onions Garlic Soy sauce Cayenne pepper Olive oil & sesame oil Salt & pepper Green little trees of health wonders Procedure A wok is ideal for stir-frying but the regular pan will do but make sure it is smoky hot when you start.
